ygData.subject: Re: Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fellow man
ygData.msgSnippet: Mistmoore gargoyles that I fought/saw when Level 26 (in group): Grinning - blue-ish Sneering - white-ish Flouting - red, red, red... Not sure of the Flouting
ygData.messageBody:
Mistmoore gargoyles that I fought/saw when Level 26 (in group):

Grinning - blue-ish
Sneering - white-ish
Flouting - red, red, red...

Not sure of the Flouting level, but 2 were pulled to the zone line by a party of 40ish players, along with other Castle nasties. If you hear a high level party shout "Train to zone", play it safe and get out of there. There may be more gargoyle types...but I'm not ready to try them out yet at 28...

:)

Ezhar Montenegro
Brother of the 28th Level, Ashen Order
Proud Member of the Platinum Sphere Guild
http://www.platinumsphere.com

>>Where are these Gargoyles at and are they as hard as the ones in Mistmoore?
>
>I don't know how hard the ones in Mistmoore are.
>
>>What do they con to you at 17th lvl? I have heard of this Island but I do
>>not
>
>These gargoyles range from level 18 - 20 (I think). They con yellow thru
>red to me. I can't remember the loc of the island, but it is Southwest of
>the Sisterhood isle. Grey rocky isle with wandering skeletons (level 12 -
>15?), wandering gargoyles and some spectres (high 30's?) standing around the
>center of the isle.
>
>>know the Loc. Also, do their eyes sell for 8 plat like the eyes from the
>>Gargs in MM?
>>
>And yes, the eyes sell for 8 plat a piece. Get maybe one eye every 5 or 6
>kills.
>
>Dornn
